name: City Builder
description: You're a government worker who is building a city one building at a time. Place parts of your building to build the tallest building ever created in this fun filled endless stacker!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: AMD Turion Dual-Core RM-75 Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 650 Storage: 50 MB available space Sound Card: M-Audio AV40
